name: TIMEOUT_VERIFY
description: This table stores the verification information for the timeout.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: VERIFY_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the IDs of the staff members who verified the timeout.

columns.name: VERIFY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: VERIFY_PERF_IN_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the timeout was performed at.

columns.name: VERIFY_RECORD_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the timeout verification took place.

columns.name: VERIF_DEVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The device used by the provider to perform the verification.

columns.name: VERIF_SECOND_DEV_C_NAME
columns.description: The second device, if any, used by the provider to perform the verification.
